message: Wow, I am enlighten with this blog post. I am feeling myself that I was in long deep sleep in matrix, all surrounded with async tasks, and for each, a brand new thread is assigned. Then I am sweating and worried about there is no more thread to assign for upcoming I/O tasks, I am looking into thread pool, but there is none, so I need find more threads to run those extra I/O tasks! What a nightmare. Then @stephen_cleary:disqus comes along and wakes me up: "Shh, no worries; THERE IS NO THREAD".
